title: Schools map
headline: "Hope" eligible schools in 2017-18
leadin: Statewide, 93 newly failing schools are required to submit a turnaround plan for the 2017-18 school year â€” which also makes them eligible to apply for financial aid through the new "Schools of Hope" program. The state will choose 25 schools to receive up to $2,000 per student for additional support services.
source: Source: Compiled by the Herald/Times using information from the Florida Department of Education. School populations are as of 2016-17 school year.
